code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewInventories=()=>{const[inventories,setInventories]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchInventories=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/inventories');setInventories(response.data);};fetchInventories();},[]);const deleteInventory=async id=>{try{await axios.delete(`http://localhost:4000/api/inventories/${id}`);setInventories(inventories.filter(inventory=>inventory._id!==id));}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting inventory:',error);}};const editInventory=id=>{window.location.href=`/inventories/edit/${id}`;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Existing Inventories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:inventories.map(inventory=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{marginBottom:'15px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Item Name:"})," ",inventory.itemName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Quantity:"})," ",inventory.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Location:"})," ",inventory.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Price:"})," $",inventory.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Description:"})," ",inventory.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>editInventory(inventory._id),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteInventory(inventory._id),children:"Delete"})]},inventory._id))})]});};export default ViewInventories;
